RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>25-34</age> <treatment_length>6 months to less than 1 year</treatment_length> <satisfaction>1</satisfaction> <effectiveness>5</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Birth Control</condition> <comment>I had to switch to this generic due to insurance. I am not happy with it. I had bad mood swings and severe constipation. Now that I am off the pill I have gone back to normal. I would not recommend this at all.</comment>
